column2: data_features <- data[, !names(data) %in% c("User_ID", "Happiness", "Anger", "Neutral", "Anxiety", "Boredom", "Sadness")] # Not going to standardize the target columns or User_ID

# This resulting DataFrame will have standardized data (with classifiers already being 0 or 1) and exclude the User ID, along with principle components that are not necessary, to remove irrelevant data that can mess with the Euclidean Distance weighting.
